text: Stefan Lindqvist (18 March 1967 – 1 March 2020) was a Swedish footballer. During his club career, Lindqvist played for Halmstad, Neuchâtel Xamax, IFK Göteborg, Motherwell and Strømsgodset IF. He made 5 appearances for the Sweden national team, scoring 1 goal. He was born in Halmstad, Sweden. Lindqvist died on 1 March 2020 in Särö, Sweden of ALS-related problems, aged 52. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:Footballers from Halmstad
title: Stefan Lindqvist
